name: Stephen Brady
text: They always have great deals, especially online. I get points and credits towards free pizzas. Also, I think it‚Äôs great they have senior discounts. Average delivery time is around 25 minutes and it‚Äôs hot and delicious. I‚Äôve had several ‚Ä¶More

name: Ivana Nikolic
text: Nice offer, pleasant young stuff, flavored crust, fast baking. Price for XL asian pizza was around $20. The tast was really good.

name: Kyle Roberts
text: Hungry Howie's is a pizza joint that is one of our favorites. The flavored crust is a must have. This crust is awesome.  I guarantee there will not be any crust lo left behind after eating a piece of pizza.

name: Becca Christensen
text: Aaron was our delivery driver tonight at the Hyatt Place hotel. He was very courteous and prompt and even stopped to thank the two gals working the front desk. It was so great to see a smiling face from a pizza delivery guy. And the pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Zedament
text: Stellar staff. 'Nuff said.

name: justis sheneman
text: On September 28th I ordered Pizza and bread sticks . I ordered right at 11 am . I thought it was going to be quick . I called twice to see what's going on . I never got it until a hour later . It was for delivery and they took over a hour . ‚Ä¶More

name: Hayden Cowdell
text: Honestly gross but the lunch deal is fire so I go there a lot

name: D Bo
text: We had a busy day and ordered pizza for a late dinner. I decided to download the Hungry Howie's app to place my order.  I liked the app and it was easy to order.  Our pizza arrived in a timely manner.  The pizza was hot and delicious! Our ‚Ä¶More

name: Jonathan Coyne
text: I love Hungry Howies, and their flavored crusts!  I would give them 5 stars, but due to the price being so high I gave them a 4.

name: Kimberli Norton
text: Very fast and friendly staff.

name: Curtis Wood
text: Pizza is good with great flavored crusts. I gave it four stars because quality is a bit inconsistent. Sometimes it's great and sometimes I get a pizza and the toppings are blotchy on top. All in all it's a good place to get a good pizza though.

name: rae anna Jennings
text:

...super fast delivery...45min turned in to 25min or less...pizza was ok..salad was fresh and good.

name: Rochelle Formentera
text: You have to try their specialty pizza... we have a lot of favorites there.. I love the convenience of their app too... it gives me points on each dollar we spent and get free pizzas later on... kids play around with their menu and we try ‚Ä¶More

name: Blaine Kiker
text: Best pizza around! Cooked to perfection and very fast delivery. Very nice delivery guy as well!! Recommended

name: Matthew Tonks
text: This store was consistently good for a long time but today's experience changed my mind. I ordered two Howie Rolls and both were seriously undercooked. I sat for over half an hour with no other customers in the store. After I started to eat ‚Ä¶More

name: Rose Belves
text: Ready quickly for pick up or delivery. Feel free to add lots of flavor to the crust! I prefer the deep dish, but all of the options are tasty.Inexpensive deliciousness.

name: Maison Field
text: I have been eating here for 5+ years, best flavors in town! Always quick and friendly service, pick up or delivery.

name: Auston Duke
text: I love these guys; great customer service and great pizza. Flavored crust is a game changer.

name: Alex Bennett
text: Pizza quality was excellent. Did a BBQ chicken pizza with ranch crust, it was phenomenal. Only complaint was the price, little on the spendy side.

name: Luke Lamoreaux
text: Good Pizza.

name: Ryan Dickens
text:

name: Lucy Sherman
text: This pizza is amazing! I prefer the garlic herb or ranch crust! ‚ù§Ô∏èI definitely think you should get pizza from this place!

name: MIRAI ZURA
text: This place always has great service and great pizza

name: Becx Becx
text: Inexpensive deliciousness, ready quickly for pick up or delivery. Feel free to add lots of flavor to the crust: it's free, whether you do 1x or 4x! I prefer the deep dish, but all of the options are tasty.

name: Enrique Romero
text: New to their take out pizza. Their thin crust has the texture of cardboard. Their sauce and toppings are edible. This is the kind of place you go for dirt cheap pizza made by high schoolers and you throw refined pizza tastes out the window. I now have a greater appreciation for Dominos.

name: Heather Holmes
text: It was delicious, the bigest samall salad ever.

name: Thomas Cluff
text: Great food at great prices! Staff is always pleasant!

name: Linda Roberts
text: Foods- pizza fairly priced fast delivery.   Great wings too

name: Jesse Carrigan
text: The Bloomington Store outright refused to deliver to my house. The guy said my house is too far even though they have delivered to my house dozens of times previously! I asked to speak to the manager and he just started mumbling. I love ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarajean M
text: Love it!

name: Dakotah Martin
text: Great pizza for a reasonable price. Definitely better than Little Caesars.

name: Brittany Wilson
text: Absolutely delicious.  We picked up a deep dish Hawaiian pizza and first to last bite was divine.  We were on our way back from Zion to go home to las Vegas and stopped by real quick absolutely worth the the slight detour.  Best deep dish ‚Ä¶More

name: Jaden Martin
text: I'm not going to come out and say this üçï isn't good, but here in St George we have lots of options when it comes to the zza. Rigatti's is amazing if you are looking for something nicer, pieology is the best make-it-yourself, Pizza Pie Cafe ‚Ä¶More

name: Emily Eitner
text: I loved the pizza and it was a good price. I wasn't a fan of the Howie rolls but they were big and luckily they we're a good deal too.

name: Rosie Rose
text: This is my FAVORITE pizza place- I love the cajun crust. Sadly, this is the last time I got to go here before moving back to Texas. Wasn't disappointed. Thanks guys.

name: Landon Empey
text: You can often find great deals here making it cheaper than little caesars, which is awesome since the quality is ahead of other similarly priced places. One reservation.. don't get the thin crust.

name: Tonya Stewart
text: Pizza is amazing the garlic crust is to die for

name: Kyle Downey
text: They need to learn how to ise that pizza cutter! haha But still amzing eats! Any pizza with asiago crust is delicious. That ranch crust is amazing too. You can get anything from this place! From great salads to chicken wings! All things good!

name: Kristina Jarosch
text: Really good pizza for chain pizza style. Vary nice employees and they delivered right to our truck at the pilot truck stop! That makes them a winner in my book.

name: Adam B.
text: Great pizza fast service.

name: Doug Rees
text: Great salads and bread stix

name: Nathan Brown
text: Kind of a little hole in the wall, but the sandwiches we're really good and the staff was really friendly.

name: Nick Johnson
text: I ordered pizza and howie bread and it took an hour to deliver and the people were really rude about it. i called 2 times and both times they told me its not there problem and hung up on me . worst customer service ever . i will never go back. and then they will ban you when you try to say it took an hour   worst place ever

name: Bruce Grant
text: This pizza is so good. We ordered it to our our room when the hotel we were staying at gave us a Hungry Howie's menu. We were more than pleasantly surprised. Wish they were a chain so we could get more on our trip!!

name: Trevor Schow
text: Pizza is mediocre.  Not as many toppings as I hoped for the price and the thin crust reminded me of a bake tortilla more than thin crust.   The deep dish and original crust were decent and I'd recommend those if you're  eating here.  I'd ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelcey Jones
text: Fast delivery, tastes great. Love the Meatball Sub and Siracha wings!

name: James Manley
text: Didn't put toppings on 2 of our pizzas, third and fourth didn't have sauce. Third time in a row Howie's has done this, not cool guys, not cool. Lady was not friendly as other reviews seem to suggest. Do I just keep going at the worst time or what is the issue Howie's?

name: Mae
text: Horrible customer service. My order was shorted 2 items. I called and they couldn't deliver what I was shorted because of a driver shortage. So I was told the 2 items I was shorted would be replaced along with 2 large pizzas for the ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristie Kelley
text: The pizza and subs were delicious. Reasonable priced, the people at the store were very friendly.

name: Clifton Heath
text: Fast service. Clean establishment. Good food!

name: SamBo198
text: Good food.

name: Kevin Frost
text: Honestly, just get Domino's Pizza instead. HH's flavored crust idea is pretty cool and all, but Domino's is half the price, and they flavor their crust just as well, if not better. I really didn't find anything special about the pizza, or ‚Ä¶More

name: Chad Spens
text: I have had several issues with this location charging for things you dont get on your pizza. I recommend finding one of the other locations.

name: Buddo Hood
text: They delivered to the Truck Stop so they are GOLDEN in my book!!! Good pizza and wings for the price! Keep up the good work!!!

name: Kaitlen Caruso
text: We no longer have any hungry howies in cali and miss it terribly!! This was EXACTLY how we remeber our favorite dishes and made our night!

name: Miguel Mercado
text: Great pizza.  I love how easy the app is to use.

name: Kyle Winters
text: Great pizza! I get it every day. You can't beat a $10 large 2 topping! Also ask for a deal and they will give it you.

name: Donta Lott
text: The thin crust pizza is nasty. It's like they brought a cheap pizza from the grocery store and sold it. The crust is hard and the pizza looks like it was about to burn and has no flavor. No wonder why it's cheap. Don't waste your time or money on the thin crust pizza.

name: Riley Porter
text: The only problem here is that recipe for the pizzas are all too rich and overpowering causing the flavors to stand out in the pizza and have them all clash in an unwanted way. The helpful staff is the only thing saving this from a low rating.

name: Brandon Davies
text: Seems like you have to call ahead or it will take a long time. The calzones were great.

name: Eric Lamb
text: Better pizza than dominoes and usually have deals or coupons that make it about the same price

name: Ana Gillham
text: Very flavorful and still warm when delivered, BETTER  than papa Johns or murpheys

name: Garry Larson
text: Way worst pizza I've ever had üòù

name: Eric Engh
text: Great pizza, friendly employees, fast service!

name: Angela Woolsey
text: Try the cheesy bread.  Yum.

name: Jennifer Hunter
text: Good pizza delivered

name: RJ N.
text: I didn't get my pizza for an hour and a half. When I got my pizza it was cold! My 8 yr old niece asked if I was feeding her old pizza. I can agree the pizza was not good! I will for sure keep hungry howies OFF my list when ordering pizza.

name: aaron warren
text: I have had a terrible experience playing phone tag for 2 hours for them to tell me they have no record of me ordering. Terribke customer service. No care about the customer

text: They have the nicest employees ever

name: Marlon Villalobos

name: Jacob Colvin

name: Jesse Arellanes
